name: Pippen's Quest
description:
My first actual completed digital game. Made in under 48 hours using Godot.

Control Pippen the die as he navigates dangers and obstacles on his quest. Pippen can only roll in fixed increments based on the result of his die roll. Once a number has been used, it can't be re-used until he hits a campfire or finds a power-up. Power-ups also randomly change the allotment of number on the die. Pippen begins with 1-6, but a power-up might trade a 2 for a 7, replace 4-6 with all 5's, or something else.
